location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 9/41 Gray Mackenzie & Co Ltd at Qatar'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers in the file are arranged chronologically. There are file notes at the end, on folios 36-38. The notes are arranged chronologically and refer to documents within the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 39; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. A previous foliation sequence, which is also circled, has been superseded and therefore crossed out.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence sent and received by the Political Agent at Bahrain concerning the operations of Gray Mackenzie & Co Ltd in Qatar, and the company's attempt to reach a lighterage agreement with the Ruler of Qatar.

name.namePart: Gray, Mackenzie and Company Limited, shipping agents
